data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.0.3 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.1 PB 5
data.actual_result: You can only see recent images that are stored locally (taking a screenshot right now will show it in recent images).
data.expected_result: All recent images should be shown regardless they are in the iCloud or not.
data.short_description: Recent images won't show iCloud photos
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable iCloud photo library when not enabled - Go to any text channel - Click on the paperclip icon - Observe the recent images
